markdownRemark.excerpt: For flex direction = column, flex-basis=0 refers to the height, so we need to specify width:0 to make sure the initial width is 0 instead of their initialâ€¦
markdownRemark.html: For flex direction = column, flex-basis=0 refers to the height, so we need to specify width:0 to make sure the initial width is 0 instead of their initial content

frontmatter.title: The Joy of Doing Things without the Need for Justification
